item.description: I built this incredible website using an amazing tool â€“ Hugo! âœ¨ Hugo, in case you’re wondering, is an absolute gem when it comes to crafting websites effortlessly. It’s an open-source static site generator that works like pure magic, transforming your ideas into captivating web pages with minimal fuss. ğŸª„ You can think of Hugo as the ultimate wand for web creation. Hugo itself is a static site generator built with Go (also known as Golang).
